td.content: s:pt presents with critical shortness of breath of 2 weeks duration together with critical cough, Respiratory. she is a 21 yo female. she denies smoking o:Height 167 cm, Weight 80 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 15, Arterial Blood Gas 7.4,PaCO2=44 mmHg,PaO2=60 mmHg, Chest X-Ray shows hyperinflated lung, SaO2 89% RA; 93% on 4L NC, Alert, Mod distress in pt ""tripod-ding"" for breath, PCO2 elevated on ABG, PEF: 25% expected, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Asthma p:administered IPRATROPIUM - 0.02 % SOLN neb over 20 min, performed Arterial Blood Gas, Chest X-Ray, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
